name: The Apocalypse - Demo
description:
Finally I finished the demo for my game and it is available now on itch.io 

Please note that I worked on this game alone for only a month so if you happened to find any glitch whether it is in the game play or sound or anything write it down in the comments.

 If I saw a lot of people enjoyed this game and wanted the full game I will work on it.

 future ascensions for the full game.

 - 8 extra guns.

 -Better animations

. - 3 more perks.

 - Weapon upgrading machine. 

- 2 more maps.

 - Extend of the original map.

 - Online mode.

 That is all from me thank you so much for the support and being patience
